description:
If you’re itching for puzzle fun, we’ve
got the perfect prescription – Dr.
Mario: Miracle Cure, only for
Nintendo 3DS family systems! Both
Dr. Mario and Dr. Luigi are on call to
deal with an outbreak of troublesome
viruses in loads of modes filled with
classic Dr. Mario mayhem. When
viruses strike, matching colours is the
only remedy!
name: Dr. Mario™: Miracle Cure
